properties.Observatio: The anicut is built of concrete and is in a dilapidated condition.The gate used for the canal is completely dilapidated. One open space, 900mm long and 600mm high, have been prepared for laying planks.
properties.Descriptio:
Raising of the existing Concrete Anicut

Scarifying existing rock surface to receive new concrete

Supplying and fixing M.S. dowels spliced and dovetailed with wedge at one end 16mm dia. And 300 mm long, boring holes to 0.15 depth in fixing

1:2:4 (20mm)

properties.Name_of_th: Galabadawatta No. 01 canal (from Thunisgala Oya to Galabadawatta Yaaya)
properties.Observatio: The total length of the canal about 850m, and concrete side walls have been constructed on the left hand side of the canal in some places. About 200m of the existing side wall are in a dilapidated condition. Command area 15.0 acres
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of 1.5m high 1:3:6 (40mm) cement concrete Retaining Wall 

Repairs to the existing 200 m long side wall

Stream / canal  reservation protection by earthfilling of  strip   of 1.5m to 2.0 m wide  and average Depth of 0.5m

Vegetative cover im

properties.Observatio: One open space, 1200mm long and 600mm high, have been prepared for laying planks. The gate used for the canal is completely dilapidated.
properties.Descriptio:
Providing 1200 mm long 600 mm wide timber anicut planks

Providing 450 mm x 450 mm steel gate with all necessary components

Miscellaneous

Contingencies 10%
